flavorText: "Pathetic. Let me show you how it's done."

foreignData.flavorText: „Erbärmlich. Ich zeig dir, wie das geht."
foreignData.name: Zuckender Konter
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl. Du kannst eine Karte aus deiner Hand, die kein Land ist und die einen Kartentyp mit dem Zauberspruch gemeinsam hat, wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen.

foreignData.name: Contralátigo
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo. Puedes lanzar sin pagar su coste de maná una carta de tu mano que no sea de tierra y que comparta un tipo de carta con ese hechizo.

foreignData.flavorText: « Pathétique. Laissez-moi vous faire une démonstration. »
foreignData.name: Contrefouet
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé. Vous pouvez lancer une carte non-terrain de votre main qui partage un type de carte avec ce sort sans payer son coût de mana.

foreignData.flavorText: "Patetico. Ti faccio vedere io come si fa."
foreignData.name: Controsferzata
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio. Puoi lanciare dalla tua mano una carta non terra che condivide un tipo di carta con quella magia senza pagare il suo costo di mana.

foreignData.flavorText: 「愚かな。正しいやり方を見せてやる。」
foreignData.name: 対抗激
foreignData.text: 呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。あなたはあなたの手札にある、その呪文と共通のカード・タイプを持つ土地でないカード１枚を、それのマナ・コストを支払うことなく唱えてもよい。

foreignData.name: 무효화의 채찍
foreignData.text: 주문 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다. 당신은 당신의 손에서 무효화된 주문과 카드 유형을 공유하는, 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 마나비용의 지불 없이 발동할 수 있다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Patético. Deixe-me lhe mostrar como se faz."
foreignData.name: Chicotada Anuladora
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica alvo. Você pode conjurar da sua mão um card que não seja um terreno e que compartilhe um tipo de card com aquela mágica sem pagar seu custo de mana.

foreignData.flavorText: «Какое убожество! Смотрите и учитесь, как надо делать».
foreignData.name: Встречный Выпад
foreignData.text: Отмените целевое заклинание. Вы можете разыграть не являющуюся землей карту в вашей руке, у которой есть такой же тип карты, как у того заклинания, без уплаты её мана-стоимости.

foreignData.name: 反打
foreignData.text: 反击目标咒语。你可以从你手上施放一张与该咒语有共通牌类别的非地牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

foreignData.name: 反打
foreignData.text: 反擊目標咒語。你可以從你手上施放一張與該咒語有共通牌類別的非地牌，且不需支付其魔法力費用。

name: Counterlash
originalText: Counter target spell. You may cast a nonland card in your hand that shares a card type with that spell without paying its mana cost.

rulings.text: You cast the card in your hand as part of the resolution of Counterlash. Timing restrictions based on the card’s type (such as creature or sorcery) are ignored. Other restrictions are not (such as “Cast [this card] only during combat”).

If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t pay any alternative costs. You can pay additional costs, such as kicker costs. If the card has mandatory additional costs, you must pay those.
If the card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as its value.

text: Counter target spell. You may cast a spell that shares a card type with it from your hand without paying its mana cost.
